page.shortlink: ux controlbar items clipping rectangle edge property
page.description: Defines the edge within the clipping rectangle from which the disclosure will be shown.

item.name: top
item.description: Disclosure is shown from the top edge of the clipping rectangle.

item.name: bottom
item.description: Disclosure is shown from the bottom edge of the clipping rectangle.

item.name: left
item.description: Disclosure is shown from the left edge of the clipping rectangle.

item.name: right
item.description: Disclosure is shown from the right edge of the clipping rectangle.
